name: Profile Tiles
description:
Created a template or two (or 18!) which are now available as a Figma community file to copy/duplicate â˜º


Each of these templates follow a loose Golden Ratio Grid. The file contains different variants of the Golden Ratio Grid too (yay!).


Profile pages in presentation can be super hard/stressful to create. Usually you will just see a name and a photo. But it is time to make your profile pages pop! like nothing ever before. This file has a small color palette design system embedded into it to enjoy and play around with.
